extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns enforcement status of the "Update Method" screensaver setting. Since the com.microsoft.autoupdate2 domain only applies to the user space, the managed preferences will be queried for the last user to login. This extension attribute requires this preference be set using Managed Preferences (MCX).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh currentUser=`last -1 -t console | awk '{print $1}'` if [ -f "/usr/bin/mcxquery" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/mcxquery -user "$currentUser" | grep -A 1 -w com.microsoft.autoupdate2 | tail -1 | awk '{print $5}'` if [ "$result" == "" ]; then result="Not set." fi fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
